A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The good things about this movie are few. Good visuals\, amazing music and an awesome fight between Rey and Kylo against the imperial guards.  Does not feel like a Star Wars movie at all. They are not trying to make something new they just recreate something from the original trilogy and throw the prequels in the trash can.
